values: 骄傲的；自豪的；得意的；自尊心强的；自负的；傲慢的；自大的；雄伟的；壮丽的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 傲慢地，自负地；得意洋洋地

word_mean_info__list.difference: 较正式用词，多用于贬义。指对身份或地位比自己低的人采取冷淡、轻视或鄙互的态度。
用于贬义，指过高估计自己，以致骄傲自大或傲慢无礼，目中无人。
指一个对自己的外表或对自己留给别的印象太过分地关注，以致自命不凡，自鸣得意。
含义广，普通用词。褒义指自豪和荣耀以及强烈的自尊；贬义则指傲慢，自以为是或自鸣得意。

word_group.brief_definition: 为…而感到自豪, 以...为傲
使某人有理由感到高兴；盛情款待
乐（或傲）如庞奇的；特别高兴（或骄傲）的；洋洋得意的；骄傲自满的
为你骄傲；为你自豪；为你感到骄傲
自豪的父亲；骄傲的父亲
自豪的国家；骄傲的国家

bilingual.source: She walked with a proud smile on her face.
bilingual.target: 她脸上带着自豪的微笑走着。

bilingual.source: Maria is a proud Latina who celebrates her heritage.
bilingual.target: 玛丽亚是一位自豪的拉丁美洲裔女性，她庆祝自己的传统。

bilingual.source: She is a proud northeasterner who loves her hometown.
bilingual.target: 她是一个自豪的东北人，热爱她的家乡。

bilingual.source: The child's performance earned a proud handclap from his parents.
bilingual.target: 孩子的表演赢得了父母自豪的鼓掌。

bilingual.source: Proud residents then started to refer to Jan as Queen of Takotna.
bilingual.target: 自豪的居民开始称简为塔科特纳女王。
说说你们最自豪的事吧？
他们所为之自豪的事情。
斯蒂芬·科维会感到自豪的。

bilingual.source: He became the proud owner of abed.
bilingual.target: 我自豪的成为一个孩子的父亲了。

bilingual.source: This is the hero of whom we are proud.
bilingual.target: 这就是我们引为自豪的英雄。

list.abstract: Proud（英[praʊd]，美[praʊd]），英语单词，形容词，译为感到自豪的；得意的；感到光荣的。短语搭配有be proud of（为…而感到自豪）。例句为“They were proud of their cuisine.（他们为自己的烹饪感到自豪。）” 该单词的近义词为beamish、complacent，反义词为humble，副词形式为proudly。

yingyinNormal.en: Who you calling butterflies? We are proud middle school survivors.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你管谁叫毛毛虫呢？我们是自豪的初中幸存者。

yingyinNormal.en: I can drink a beer underwater. And I'm sure your parents are proud.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以在水下喝一瓶啤酒。我肯定你父母会感到自豪的。

yingyinNormal.en: So you have many reasons to feel proud of yourself as you sit here today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们有很多为今天出席毕业日活动感到自豪的理由。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: But I am a proud Mongol. At times, peace can only be achieved through cruel war.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我是个自豪的蒙古人，有时只有通过残酷的战争才能实现和平。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm proud that we ignite innovation, create jobs, benefit customers and help entrepreneurs fulfill their dreams.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我感到更自豪的是，我们能够点燃创新，创造机会，造福客户，并且能给创业者圆梦。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh right, of course. You gotta... you have no idea there's so much to show you. You're gonna be so awesomely proud! Come on! Come on!
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，对，当然了，你得看看...你不知道我有多少东西要给你看，你会为我自豪的，来呀！来呀！

yingyinNormal.en: He said he wouldn't pay for my lawyer. Then he told me to come here and learn about the value of money from the one daughter he's actually proud off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说不帮我付律师费，还叫我来跟他唯一自豪的女儿学学金钱的价值。

yingyinNormal.en: Without further ado, this year, I am very proud to award the Henry Ward Beecher medal to the student whose quiet strength has carried up the most hearts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不再继续拖延了，今年，我非常自豪的把亨利沃德比彻奖章颁发给这个默默激励了很多同学的孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: That's progress we can be proud of.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们以这样的进展而自豪。

yingyinNormal.en: I am proud of all my friends today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我今天真以我的朋友们为荣。

yingyinNormal.en: Would she have been proud of me? Yes. Very.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她会为我骄傲吗？会的，非常骄傲。

yingyinNormal.en: Congratulations, buddy. I'm so proud of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恭喜你了，小弟，我为你感到骄傲。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe sometimes I'm not so proud of who I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许有时候我并不为真实的自己感到骄傲。

yingyinNormal.en: Please, this isn't about me. I'm proud of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，今天的主角不是我，我真为你骄傲。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh! Oh, spectacular! I'm so proud of you boys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太感人了！我为你们感到骄傲，小家伙们。

yingyinNormal.en: You see, Warren Robinett was proud of Adventure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 沃伦·罗宾内特为《魔幻历险》骄傲。

yingyinNormal.en: Me? What about that big belly you're so proud of?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我？你引以为豪的大肚子又如何呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm proud of you. You're taking this really well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要给你点赞，你还挺能接受这件事。

yingyinNormal.en: It gives it that extra edge. You've done us proud.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别有一番风味，我们为你骄傲。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm looking forward to the samples. We're all very proud.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我期待着样品出来，我们都很骄傲。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 自豪的; 值得骄傲的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 自豪地；傲慢地；得意洋洋地

word_family.mean: adj. 感到自豪的；得意的；感到光荣的；略微隆起的；骄傲的；傲慢的；妄自尊大的；雄伟的；自尊心强的；壮丽的

sense_info_list.en: feeling deep pleasure or satisfaction as a result of one's own achievements, qualities, or possessions or those of someone with whom one is closely associated
sense_info_list.zh: 自豪的; 值得骄傲的

examination_example.sentence: She is <highlight>proud</highlight> that several sculptures have even gone on display again, albeit sometimes beneath protective cases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让她感到自豪的是，尽管有时还要带着保护套，有几尊雕塑得以再次被展出。

examination_example.sentence: Britons rate "the countryside" alongside the royal family, Shakespeare and the National Health Service (NHS) as what makes them <highlight>proudest</highlight> of their country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国人将“乡村”与王室、莎士比亚和国民医疗服务体系并列为他们国家最令人引以为豪的东西。

sense_info_list.en: having or showing a high or excessively high opinion of oneself or one's importance

word_usage.usage:
proud可作定语和表语，作表语时，常用句型有：be proud of sb./sth./doing sth.对（做）某事感到自豪/骄傲、be proud for sth. / sb.to do sth.对某人做某事感到自豪/骄傲、be proud to do sth.对做某事感到自豪/骄傲。例：
We are proud for you to win the championship.
我们为你赢得冠军而骄傲。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“傲慢的，妄自尊大的”，一般指人的态度非常高傲。
意为“不友好的；傲慢的”，特指不肯让步的意思。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 自豪的; 值得骄傲的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: feeling deep pleasure or satisfaction as a result of one's own achievements, qualities, or possessions or those of someone with whom one is closely associated
sense_info_list.zh: 自豪的; 值得骄傲的

examination_example.sentence: Coining up with a good story means getting reflective about what made their career accomplishments―something they're <highlight>proud</highlight> of, and what strengths those accomplishments highlight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 创造一个好的故事意味着思考是什么成就了他们的职业生涯——让他们感到骄傲的事情，以及这些成就突出了什么优势。

examination_example.sentence: They will feel <highlight>proud</highlight> of being pioneers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会为自己是开拓者而感到自豪。
他们为自己的美食感到自豪。

word_usage.usage:
“为...自豪/感到骄傲”多用be proud of表达，proud后也可跟动词不定式或that从句。
示例：I am proud of being a Chinese.
身为一个中国人，我感到很自豪。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 自豪的; 值得骄傲的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: feeling deep pleasure or satisfaction as a result of one's own achievements; qualities; or possessions or those of someone with whom one is closely associated
sense_info_list.zh: 自豪的; 值得骄傲的

examination_example.sentence: They feel <highlight>proud</highlight> of being outstanding problem solvers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们为自己是解决问题的能手而感到自豪。

examination_example.sentence: The author was <highlight>proud</highlight> of using a lunch box in her childhood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者以小时候用过饭盒为荣。

examination_example.sentence: In the ideal world, we're all doing work that we're <highlight>proud</highlight> of and that provides meaning and purpose to us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在理想的世界里，我们都在做着自己引以为傲的工作，这为我们提供了生活的意义和目的。

word_usage.usage:
“为...自豪/感到骄傲”多用be proud of表达，proud后也可跟动词不定式或that从句。
示例：I am proud of being a Chinese.
身为一个中国人，我感到很自豪。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 自豪地；傲慢地；得意洋洋地

word_family.mean: adj. 感到自豪的；得意的；感到光荣的；略微隆起的；骄傲的；傲慢的；妄自尊大的；雄伟的；自尊心强的；壮丽的

examination_example.sentence: How pleased and <highlight>proud</highlight> Mother would be when they brought her breakfast in bed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们把早餐送到母亲的床上时，她会多么高兴和自豪。

examination_example.sentence: What makes her more <highlight>proud</highlight> of them is that they have gone from their first animation to creating their own works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更让她感到自豪的是，他们已经从第一部动画开始创作自己的作品。

examination_example.sentence: I was very <highlight>proud</highlight> that I was going to a college.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很自豪我要上大学了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 自豪的; 自尊的; 值得骄傲的
傲慢的; 骄傲自大的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 自豪地；傲慢地；得意洋洋地

word_family.mean: adj. 感到自豪的；得意的；感到光荣的；略微隆起的；骄傲的；傲慢的；妄自尊大的；雄伟的；自尊心强的；壮丽的

sense_info_list.en: feeling deep pleasure or satisfaction as a result of one's own achievements, qualities, or possessions
sense_info_list.zh: 自豪的; 自尊的; 值得骄傲的

examination_example.sentence_trans: 她为自己的工作感到自豪

examination_example.sentence: I wanted to make my parents <highlight>proud</highlight> by doing some notable achievements that would surprise the rest of the world．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想通过做一些令世界惊讶的显著成就来让我的父母骄傲。

sense_info_list.en: having or showing a high or excessively high opinion of oneself or one's importance
sense_info_list.zh: 傲慢的; 骄傲自大的

examination_example.sentence: "I am sorry I was so <highlight>proud</highlight>." replied Turkey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “对不起，我太傲慢了。”火鸡回答说。

examination_example.sentence: The other animals thought Turkey was too <highlight>proud</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他动物认为火鸡太傲慢了。

examination_example.sentence: It's better to learn to be modest now rather than take a <highlight>proud</highlight> fall later in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与其在以后的生活中骄傲地跌倒，不如现在学会谦虚。

word_usage.usage:
“为...自豪/感到骄傲”多用be proud of表达，proud后也可跟动词不定式或that从句。
示例：I am proud of being a Chinese.
身为一个中国人，我感到很自豪。
